title: Punj Lloyd Limited
summary: Punj Lloyd Limited has informed the Exchange about Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process : This is to inform you that in terms of Regultion 32 B of The Insolvency & Bankruptcy Board of India (Liquidation Process) Regulations, 2016, the Twenty First meeting of the...
fullContent: Punj Lloyd Limited has informed the Exchange about Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process : This is to inform you that in terms of Regultion 32 B of The Insolvency & Bankruptcy Board of India (Liquidation Process) Regulations, 2016, the Twenty First meeting of the Stakeholders Consultation Committee of Punj Lloyd Ltd. is scheduled to be held on 19th August , 2025 at 2.30 P.M. at Punj Lloyd Limited, Corporate Office, Plate No. 2, Second Floor, Tower No. 2, NBCC Plaza, Sector V, Pushp Vihar, Saket, New Delhi - 110017 as well as through Audio Visual mode, to discuss the way forward in the Liquidation sale process of the Company (including sale of teh Company on going concern basis). |SUBJECT: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process
